We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Minimum _min;
// In Initialize()
_min = MIN(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_min.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Periods Since Minimum", _min.PeriodsSinceMinimum);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Is Ready", _min.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Warm Up Period", _min.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Period", _min.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Current", _min.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Name", _min.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Samples", _min.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.min = self.MIN(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.min.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Periods Since Minimum", self.min.PeriodsSinceMinimum);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Is Ready", self.min.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Warm Up Period", self.min.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Period", self.min.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Current", self.min.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Name", self.min.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MIN Samples", self.min.Samples);
}
